newsitem.title: USA: Tangram, Western NY, form alliance.
newsitem.headline: Tangram, Western NY, form alliance.

text.p: Tangram Enterprise Solutions Inc said Monday that it has teamed with Western New York Computing Systems Inc to market IT asset tracking software solutions to its business partners in the Western New York State region.

The company said its Asset Insight and the Asset Insight Internet Subsystem, will play a key role in launching WNYCS's Asset Management Services, which adds asset tracking/asset management to WNYCS's computer capabilities.

Tangram is a member of the Safeguard Scientifics Inc partnership of companies, which develops advanced technology- oriented, entrepreneurially driven companies with an emphasis on information systems markets.
